scripts.build:lib:watch: glob-exec "@orbit-model/*/tsconfig.json" -- "tsc --build {{(function() { const Path = require('path'); return files.map(f => './'+Path.dirname(f) ).join(' '); })()}} --watch"
scripts.build:demo:watch: glob-exec "demo/*/tsconfig.json" -- "tsc --build {{(function() { const Path = require('path'); return files.map(f => './'+Path.dirname(f) ).join(' '); })()}} --watch"
scripts.pre-push: pnpm run build && pnpm run test && cd demo/node-typescript/dist && node ./index.js
scripts.publish:release: pnpm run build && lerna version --no-push && lerna publish from-git --dist-tag latest --no-git-reset
scripts.publish:beta: pnpm run build && lerna version --preid=beta --no-push && lerna publish from-git --preid=beta --dist-tag beta --no-git-reset
scripts.publish:canary: pnpm run build && lerna publish --canary --preid=alpha --dist-tag canary --no-git-reset
